yanki from Vlaakith.

Join Orpheus into battle

Ending Requirements and Conditions:

Reject the Emperor's offer to work together Free Orpheus Don't let Orpheus becoming the Mind Flayer

ENDING DESCRIPTION

Similar as the ending above, but this time don't let Prince Orpheus become the Mind Flayer, either let MC become the Mind Flayer, or ask Karlach to do so. But if you are a mind flayer, Lae'zel will refuse to stay with you, ending the romance.
